channel.title: Invalid password glich
channel.description:
on my server when you get the wrong password to your account it'll say wrong password. but if you hit login again it'll log your account in, change the password to the invalid one, and reset your account.. how do i fix this? i replaced client.java and it fixed it, so i know it's in client.java. i replaced public void loggedinpm with the one on the working client.java and it still didn't work.
so can anybody out there help me?
thanks. :o
